works.description:
My original copyrighted content, based on
 
educational matters and presented in Question/Answer format published in  
Dec'09 that have been stolen and republished in Oct'11: Content beginning 

with the text "Q.1: Select the ionic compound -
(a) Sulphur molecule, S8 (b) Phosphorous molecule, P4 ..... Q.15:
Molecules  
without a charged valency are contained by only -
(a) metals (b) non-metals (c) gases (d) none of these."

Text copied from line 3 to line 24 of the original Post. This blogger is a
 
repeat infringer since we earlier in June'11 also detected and complained 

about content infringment on their Blogs.
